content:
I don't have access to specific financial data or current status of belo's revenue streams. however, i can provide some information on belo's financial performance in the past.

belo corporation's financial reports have shown that their digital revenue streams have been growing steadily over time, and have played an increasingly important role in the company's overall revenue mix. for instance, in 2012, belo reported total digital revenue of $84.5 million, which represented 12% of their total revenue for that year. by 2013, their digital revenue had increased to $97.2 million or 14% of their total revenue. similarly, in 2014 and 2015, belo's digital ad revenue increased by 18% and 16%, respectively.

however, it is important to mention that the media industry has been facing significant challenges in recent years, such as declining print readership and ad revenue, and increased competition from digital-only players. therefore, the success of belo's digital revenue streams may be affected by broader industry trends.

in conclusion, belo has made significant efforts to diversify its revenue streams and adapt to the changing media landscape. while the company's digital revenue streams have shown signs of growth, their overall success may still depend on several factors, including their ability to attract and retain digital audiences, adapt to new technologies, and develop innovative and effective advertising strategies.
